Ingredients.6: 1 dash Sriracha hot sauce, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 medium avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced

Directions.1: Pulse cauliflower florets in a food processor until riced.

Directions.2: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add cauliflower rice, cover, and steam, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes.

Directions.3: Transfer cauliflower rice to a bowl and stir in cream cheese, rice vinegar, and sweetener. Place in the refrigerator to chill until cold, about 1 hour.

Directions.4: Mix the chopped tuna with Sriracha in a separate bowl to desired spiciness.

Directions.5: Spread 1/3 of the cauliflower mixture on a plastic wrap-covered bamboo rolling mat until you have a square roughly the size of a nori sheet.

Directions.6: Place one sheet of nori on top of the cauliflower rice square. Place 1/3 of the avocado slices and 1/3 of the tuna mixture along one edge on top of the nori. Carefully roll, starting from the edge with the fillings. Sprinkle with 1/3 of the sesame seeds and cut the roll into 6 slices with a sharp knife. Repeat with remaining cauliflower rice, nori, avocado slices, tuna mixture, and sesame seeds.
